name: linux-gamer
description: Installs/Configures open source games on GNU/Linux.
long_description:
Travis-ci status: [![Build Status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/jackl0phty/opschef-cookbook-linux-gamer.png?branch=master)](http://travis-ci.org/jackl0phty/opschef-cookbook-linux-gamer) Description =========== Primary objective of this cookbook: Install/configure open source games on the GNU/Linux platform. Will probably focus on Debian/Ubuntu support since Linux Mint+Cinnamon is my gaming platform of choice. Supported Platforms =================== Debian, & Ubuntu. Requirements ============ A GNU/Linux client. Usage ===== Install arcade games (clients). Add the following to your run list to install arcade games (clients). 

"recipe[linux-gamer::arcade_games_client]"
Install arcade games (servers). Add the following to your run list to install arcade games (servers). 

"recipe[linux-gamer::arcade_games_server]"
Install board games (clients). Add the following to your run list to install board games (clients). 

"recipe[linux-gamer::board_games_client]"
Install board games (servers). Add the following to your run list to install board games (servers). 

"recipe[linux-gamer::board_games_server]"
Install card games (clients). Add the following to your run list to install card games (clients). 

"recipe[linux-gamer::card_games_client]"
Install card games (servers). Add the following to your run list to install card games (servers). 

"recipe[linux-gamer::card_games_server]"
Install various game emulators. Add the following to your run list to install various game emulators 

"recipe[linux-gamer::emulators]"
Install puzzle games (clients). Add the following to your run list to install puzzle games (clients). 

"recipe[linux-gamer::puzzle_games_client]"
Install role playing games (RPG). (clients) Add the following to your run list to install role playing games (RPG). (clients) 

"recipe[linux-gamer::rpg_games_client]"
Install role playing games (RPG). (servers) Add the following to your run list to install role playing games (RPG). (servers) 

"recipe[linux-gamer::rpg_games_servers]"
Install simulation games (clients). Add the following to your run list to install simulation games (clients). 

"recipe[linux-gamer::simulation_games_client]"
Install WINE (Wine Is Not an Emulator). Add the following to your run list to install role playing games (RPG). (clients) 

"recipe[linux-gamer::wine]"
Attributes ========== Note: By default, this cookbook doesn't install/configure anything. Set to 'yes' to install all games supported by this cookbook. 

default['linux-gamer']['install_all'] = "no"
Set to yes to install latest wine via apt-get 

default['linux-gamer']['install_wine'] = "no"
This is set to latest version of wine 

default['linux-gamer']['latest_stable_wine'] = "1.4"
Set to yes to install latest wine from source to /opt 

default['linux-gamer']['install_wine_from_source'] = "no"
Install Open Arena client 

default['linux-gamer']['install_open_arena_client'] = "no"
Install Open Arena server default['linux-gamer']['install_open_arena_server'] = "no" Install PVPGN client ( e.g. Player vs. Player Gaming Network ) 

default['linux-gamer']['install_pvpgn_client'] = "no"
Install PVPGN server ( e.g. Player vs. Player Gaming Network ) 

default['linux-gamer']['install_open_arena_server'] = "no"
